metadata.description: Combined Interface and Logic Subgraph for Eventric Tour Management Demo UI - UI components and business logic workflows with trigger relationships

nodes.name: VenueList
nodes.description: Compact list of selected venues with dates and locations

nodes.name: CalendarPicker
nodes.description: Interactive calendar for selecting tour dates

style.className: flex flex-col items-center gap-10 w-full h-full p-6

nodes.name: RiderCategorySidebar
nodes.description: Collapsible navigation sidebar for rider requirement categories

nodes.name: TourCreationWorkflow
nodes.description: Manages the tour creation process including form input capture, rider document upload, and navigation to venue selection step. Handles form state management for tour name, start/end dates, and rider file upload with progress tracking.

editingTourDetails.description: User is filling out tour creation form

noFile.description: No rider file has been selected

uploading.description: Rider file is being uploaded with simulated progress

uploaded.description: Rider file has been successfully uploaded

navigatingToVenues.description: User clicked Continue button to proceed to venue selection

nodes.name: FileUploadProcess
nodes.description: Simulates file upload progress for rider documents. Implements a progress simulation using setInterval to increment upload progress from 0% to 100% in 10% increments every 300ms.

validatingFile.description: Validating file type and extracting file name

nodes.name: VenueSelectionWorkflow
nodes.description: Manages venue selection process including day type selection (show/off/travel), venue information form capture, and navigation to rider validation. Handles form state for venue name, address, city, state, zip code, and country.

selectingVenue.description: User is filling out venue selection form

navigatingToRiderValidation.description: User clicked Continue to proceed to rider validation

nodes.name: RiderItemEditingLogic
nodes.description: Manages inline editing of rider items with edit mode toggle, text input changes, update/save functionality, and cancel/revert functionality. Maintains separate edit state and original item state for rollback capability.

viewMode.description: Rider item is displayed in read-only mode

editMode.description: Rider item is in edit mode with editable textarea

cancelingChanges.description: Canceling edit and reverting to original text

actions.updateItemDescription: setItems(items.map(i => i.id === itemId ? {...i, description: editTexts[itemId], isEditing: false} : i))

nodes.name: RiderValidationWorkflow
nodes.description: Manages the rider validation page workflow including displaying equipment items, enabling inline editing for multiple items concurrently, and navigating to tour review step. Handles state for multiple rider items and their edit states.

displayingItems.description: Displaying list of rider requirement items with edit capabilities

itemsList.description: Managing state of multiple rider items

loaded.description: Equipment items loaded from equipmentItems array

navigatingToReview.description: User clicked Continue to proceed to tour review

nodes.name: VenueReviewWorkflow
nodes.description: Manages the tour review page displaying venue compliance grid, modal for venue details, and venue navigation within modal. Calculates compliance colors based on score thresholds and aggregates badge totals across all venues.

context.totalBadges: { red: number, yellow: number, green: number }

displayingGrid.description: Displaying venue compliance grid with all venues

showing.description: Displaying selected venue details in modal

navigatingPrev.description: Moving to previous venue in list

navigatingNext.description: Moving to next venue in list

actions.calculateTotalBadges: venues.reduce((acc, venue) => ({ red: acc.red + venue.badges.red, yellow: acc.yellow + venue.badges.yellow, green: acc.green + venue.badges.green }), {red: 0, yellow: 0, green: 0})

nodes.name: VenueModalNavigation
nodes.description: Manages modal state transitions for venue detail viewing including open, close, and carousel navigation between venues. Implements circular navigation with wraparound at list boundaries.

open.description: Modal is visible showing venue details

actions.navigateToPrevVenue: const prevIndex = currentIndex > 0 ? currentIndex - 1 : venues.length - 1; setSelectedVenue(venues[prevIndex])
actions.navigateToNextVenue: const nextIndex = currentIndex < venues.length - 1 ? currentIndex + 1 : 0; setSelectedVenue(venues[nextIndex])

nodes.name: CalendarDateSelection
nodes.description: Manages calendar date selection logic including month navigation (previous/next), date selection within current month, and optional callback invocation when date is selected. Handles date range calculations and selection state.

nodes.name: RiderCategoryToggle
nodes.description: Manages expansion/collapse of rider category sections in the sidebar. Implements toggle behavior where clicking an expanded section collapses it, and clicking a collapsed section expands it while collapsing others (accordion pattern).

equipmentExpanded.description: Equipment section is expanded showing subsections

nodes.name: WizardProgressionWorkflow
nodes.description: Manages the 4-step wizard flow for tour management: Create Tour â†’ Select Venues â†’ Rider Validation â†’ Tour Review. Tracks current step, marks completed steps, and enables navigation between steps.

createTour.description: Step 1: Creating tour with name, dates, and rider upload

selectVenues.description: Step 2: Selecting venues and entering venue details

riderValidation.description: Step 3: Validating and editing rider requirements

tourReview.description: Step 4: Reviewing tour with venue compliance grid

actions.markStepCompleted: Mark previous steps as completed based on current step ID

edges.label: route_to_home
edges.details: React Router route definition: path='/' renders CreateTourPage (Index component)

edges.label: route_to_select_venues
edges.details: React Router route definition: path='/select-venues' renders SelectVenuesPage

edges.label: route_to_tour_review
edges.details: React Router route definition: path='/tour-review' renders TourReviewPage

edges.label: route_to_not_found
edges.details: React Router catch-all route: path='*' renders NotFoundPage for undefined routes

edges.details: Continue button triggers navigate('/select-venues') via handleContinue function

edges.label: wizard_step_continue
edges.details: Continue button triggers navigate('/rider-validation') via handleContinue function

edges.label: wizard_step_continue
edges.details: Continue button triggers navigate('/tour-review') via handleContinue function

edges.label: return_to_home
edges.details: Link element with href='/' allows users to return to home page from 404 error

edges.details: WizardSteps Link component for step 1 navigates to path='/' (Create Tour)

edges.label: wizard_step_2
edges.details: WizardSteps Link component for step 2 navigates to path='/select-venues'

edges.label: wizard_step_4

edges.label: uses_wizard_navigation
edges.details: SelectVenuesPage imports and renders WizardSteps component to show wizard progress

edges.details: SelectVenuesPage imports and renders Calendar component for date selection

edges.label: uses_venue_list

edges.label: uses_header

edges.label: uses_wizard_navigation
edges.details: RiderValidationPage imports and renders WizardSteps component to show wizard progress

edges.label: uses_wizard_navigation
edges.details: TourReviewPage imports and renders WizardSteps component to show wizard progress

TourCreationWorkflow triggers FileUploadProcess when user selects a rider document file. The handleFileSelect function (Index.tsx:15-34) initiates the simulated upload with progress tracking by calling setInterval to increment upload progress from 0% to 100%.

VenueSelectionWorkflow uses CalendarDateSelection for date selection functionality. SelectVenues.tsx imports Calendar component (line 6) and renders it (line 49) to allow users to select event dates for venue scheduling.

RiderValidationWorkflow uses RiderCategoryToggle for organizing and navigating rider requirement categories. RiderValidation.tsx imports RiderSidebar component (line 6) and renders it (line 161) to provide category navigation (Equipment, Facilities, Information, Parking, Local Crew, Logistics, Production).

RiderValidationWorkflow uses RiderItemEditingLogic to enable inline editing of rider requirement descriptions. The workflow includes handleEditClick (line 75), handleUpdate (line 83), handleCancel (line 93), and handleTextChange (line 105) functions that implement the edit-update-cancel pattern for rider items.

VenueReviewWorkflow uses VenueModalNavigation to display detailed venue information in a modal with carousel navigation. The workflow includes handleOpenModal (line 130), handleCloseModal (line 135), handlePrevVenue (line 140), and handleNextVenue (line 147) functions that manage modal state and venue navigation.

TourCreationWorkflow uses WizardProgressionWorkflow for tracking and displaying current step in the 4-step wizard. Index.tsx imports WizardSteps component (line 4) and renders it (line 52) to show Step 1: Create Tour as active and mark previous steps as completed.

VenueSelectionWorkflow uses WizardProgressionWorkflow for tracking and displaying current step in the 4-step wizard. SelectVenues.tsx imports WizardSteps component (line 5) and renders it (line 35) to show Step 2: Select Venues as active and mark Step 1 as completed.

RiderValidationWorkflow uses WizardProgressionWorkflow for tracking and displaying current step in the 4-step wizard. RiderValidation.tsx imports WizardSteps component (line 5) and renders it (line 121) to show Step 3: Rider Validation as active and mark Steps 1-2 as completed.

VenueReviewWorkflow uses WizardProgressionWorkflow for tracking and displaying current step in the 4-step wizard. TourReview.tsx imports WizardSteps component (line 11) and renders it (line 172) to show Step 4: Tour Review as active and mark Steps 1-3 as completed.

TourCreationWorkflow navigates to VenueSelectionWorkflow when user clicks Continue button. The handleContinue function (Index.tsx:36-38) calls navigate('/select-venues') to proceed to Step 2 of the wizard flow, transitioning from tour creation to venue selection.

VenueSelectionWorkflow navigates to RiderValidationWorkflow when user clicks Continue button. The handleContinue function (SelectVenues.tsx:19-21) calls navigate('/rider-validation') to proceed to Step 3 of the wizard flow, transitioning from venue selection to rider validation.

RiderValidationWorkflow navigates to VenueReviewWorkflow when user clicks Continue button. The handleContinue function (RiderValidation.tsx:71-73) calls navigate('/tour-review') to proceed to Step 4 of the wizard flow, transitioning from rider validation to final tour review.

CreateTourPage triggers TourCreationWorkflow through user interactions with tour creation form. Event handlers: onChange for tourName (Index.tsx:76), startDate (line 92), endDate (line 107) capture form inputs. onClick handleContinue (line 188) initiates navigation to venue selection. The page manages workflow state through useState hooks (lines 8-13) for tourName, startDate, endDate, riderFileName, isUploading, uploadProgress fields.

CreateTourPage triggers FileUploadProcess when user selects a rider document file. Event handler: onChange handleFileSelect (Index.tsx:127) extracts file from input, sets riderFileName (line 18), initiates upload simulation with setIsUploading(true) and setUploadProgress(0) (lines 19-20), then starts setInterval (lines 23-32) to increment progress from 0% to 100% in 10% steps every 300ms. File input accepts .pdf, .doc, .docx formats (line 126).

SelectVenuesPage triggers VenueSelectionWorkflow through venue form interactions and day type selection. Event handlers: onClick for day type buttons - setDayType('show') (SelectVenues.tsx:62), setDayType('off') (line 72), setDayType('travel') (line 82). onChange handlers for venue form: venueName (line 105), streetAddress (line 122), city (line 138), state (line 153), zipCode (line 168), country (line 184). onClick handleContinue (line 211) navigates to rider validation. The page manages workflow state through useState hooks (lines 11-17).

RiderValidationPage triggers RiderValidationWorkflow to display and manage rider requirement items collection. The page loads equipmentItems array (RiderValidation.tsx:16-56) into items state via useState (line 60), maintains editTexts state for edit mode (lines 61-69), and provides onClick handleContinue (line 514) to navigate to tour review. The workflow orchestrates display of multiple rider items (lines 175-256) with inline editing capabilities for each item in the collection.

RiderValidationPage triggers RiderItemEditingLogic for inline editing of individual rider item descriptions. Event handlers: onClick handleEditClick (RiderValidation.tsx:244) sets item.isEditing to true (lines 76-80), enabling edit mode with textarea. onChange handleTextChange (line 196) updates editTexts state as user types (lines 105-107). onClick handleUpdate (line 210) saves changes by updating item description and setting isEditing to false (lines 84-90). onClick handleCancel (line 219) reverts changes and exits edit mode (lines 93-102). Each handler receives item.id parameter for targeted updates.

TourReviewPage triggers VenueReviewWorkflow to display venue compliance grid and calculate aggregate metrics. The page renders venues array (TourReview.tsx:26-107) in a grid layout, calculates totalBadges using reduce operation (lines 121-128) to sum red, yellow, green counts across all venues. onClick handleOpenModal (line 284) triggers when user clicks venue card, setting selectedVenue and isModalOpen states (lines 130-133). The workflow implements getComplianceColor function (lines 109-115) to apply color thresholds: red (<40), yellow (40-79), green (>=80).

TourReviewPage triggers VenueModalNavigation for detailed venue viewing with carousel navigation. Event handlers: onClick handleOpenModal (TourReview.tsx:284) sets selectedVenue and setIsModalOpen(true) (lines 130-133). onClick handleCloseModal (lines 344, 358, 546) calls setIsModalOpen(false) and clears selectedVenue after 300ms timeout (lines 135-138). onClick handlePrevVenue (line 416) finds current venue index, calculates prevIndex with wraparound (currentIndex > 0 ? currentIndex - 1 : venues.length - 1), updates selectedVenue (lines 140-145). onClick handleNextVenue (line 422) calculates nextIndex with wraparound and updates selectedVenue (lines 147-152).

WizardNavigation triggers WizardProgressionWorkflow to track current wizard step and mark completed steps. The component uses useLocation hook (WizardSteps.tsx:18) to get current route, maps steps array (lines 4-15) with paths: '/' (Create Tour), '/select-venues', '/rider-validation', '/tour-review'. getCurrentStepId function (lines 20-23) finds active step by matching location.pathname against step paths. Each step renders as Link component (line 34) with onClick navigation to step.path (line 36). Visual state determined by isActive (line 30) and isCompleted (line 31) flags for styling current and past steps.

CalendarPicker triggers CalendarDateSelection logic for month navigation and date selection. Event handlers: onClick handlePrevMonth (Calendar.tsx:103) decrements currentMonth by calling setCurrentMonth with new Date(currentMonth.getFullYear(), currentMonth.getMonth() - 1) (lines 39-43). onClick handleNextMonth (line 114) increments currentMonth similarly (lines 45-49). onClick handleDateClick (line 73) when user clicks a date button, receives day parameter, calls setSelectedDate(day) and invokes optional onDateSelect callback with new Date object (lines 51-58). Conditional onClick (line 73) only triggers if isCurrentMonth is true to prevent invalid date selection.

RiderCategorySidebar triggers RiderCategoryToggle logic for expanding/collapsing category sections in accordion pattern. Event handler: onClick button (RiderSidebar.tsx:34) calls setExpandedSection with toggle logic: expandedSection === section.id ? '' : section.id (lines 35-37). Clicking expanded section collapses it by setting empty string. Clicking collapsed section expands it and collapses others by setting to clicked section.id. Maintains expandedSection state (line 26) initialized to 'equipment'. Sections array (lines 11-23) defines 7 categories: Equipment (with subsections), Facilities, Information, Parking, Local Crew, Logistics, Production. Visual state controlled by expandedSection comparison (lines 40-43, 48-51, 55-58, 64-89).
